description.narrative: Investment enables the provision of disability-inclusive development technical assistance to support disability-inclusive outcomes in the Australian aid program. This investment includes the costs associated with approaching the market; preparing the scope of services; and obtaining external independent evaluation of tenders. This investment also includes the provision of technical assistance and support, provided to DFAT and implementing partners through a partnership agreement, and a final independent review at the conclusion of the partnership. This investment is an enabler to implement the Development for All 2015-2020: Strategy for strengthening disability-inclusive development ion Australia's aid program. The total value of this investment is $2.4 million over 4 years, starting 2016-17.
